Posts.Content: Hi. Wondered if anyone has been getting this with fec t treatment after chemo two. It never goes away. Oncologist thinks it is not but a nurse thinks it is when I rang last week. I start the second part of fec t next week and have been told this treatment msy cause puns and needles so would like find out if anyone else has had it. Thank you so much. Think this site is wonderful. Good luck to everyonexx
Posts.Title: Pins and needles in fingers

Posts.Content: Hi so sorry about yr skin. Did not have any probs so hope someone gets back to you. Seems there are so many dif side effects and it's very individual. I'm half way thru about to start the t bit and wondering what to expect! By day nine I'm much better. Having to have week off work after chemo now but at least can work sometimes. Good luck to you
Posts.Title: My skin is terrible!
